data.title: Artisanal Water Well
data.summary: Provide easy access to clean water for the vilage, supports 400-600 individuals. Crafting lifelines from the earth, artisanal wells bring sustenance to parched lands.

featuredImage.alt: Wells in Africa: Villagers gathering water from a new well in a rural village

content.heading: Each well stands as a paving the way for healthier, thriving livelihoods.
content.description: Artisanal Water Wells are more than sources; they’re symbols of community strength. Join us in providing vital access to clean water

content.heading: How is ARCD's Relief responding?
content.description: ARCD’s Relief constructs artisanal water wells, utilizing cost-effective methods to create sustainable water sources for communities lacking access.

content.heading: Building a well, Crafting Hope
content.description: Your donation facilitates the construction of artisanal water wells, offering communities reliable access to clean water, fostering resilience, and nurturing sustainable livelihoods.

featuredImage.alt: Ruins of buildings in Morocco following a devastating earthquake, with rescue workers in action.

latestUpdates.title: Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko Well

featuredImage.alt: Mariame Diawara and Fatoumata Tiemoko on the well built by Africa Relief
